Excluding you whom it wont be able to hit at all unless you're sitting still AFKTerran is the easiest race to play for starters as they only have to worry about 2 things:Argon in red sectors (or past them any other aliens whom they dont build faction with)Pirates whom are easy to deal with as most of the time they'll ignore you or you can find and kill their base as they dont randomly spawn like Argon do.Argons have the constant threat of Xenon warping through any gate at any time and killing everything on your transport ship that took you hours to collect... Every other race has it as hard / harder...Overall I'd say this game needs a massive reduction in missile spam (missile ships / bombers are allright but when you see over 200 missiles in a cyclone flying at you each one does 10% damage you're just wondering WTF...)Random spawns of enemies whos only job is to kill your ships is total crap, especially if you have no enemies... i flew to earth as a Argon without anything attacking me but soon as I tell my trade ship to fly though no more then 15 seconds there's terran M2 behind it closing in and 1 shots it with a missile... then leaves as if it was normal for that♥♥♥♥♥♥to happenUntil then I cant recommend this game for normal people, tho I do recommend it for people who understand the game's script codes (I use a money cheat to replace all my lost goods from random Xenon raids in sectors over 10 jumps away from any Xenon space), or people that just like being beat up, knocked down, and beat up some more...

Surprising right, I know I know, It doesn't look like much from the pictures given, but a world that is amazing and full of unlimited possibilities awaits just beyond that door. This however is extremely difficult and takes a lot of preparation. So, whether or not you are planning your large heist you have to encounter trading at some point. This concept can take a little getting used to but my recommendation would be to go around trading energy cells until you have a good amount of cash, all the while looking at rising and falling stocks at the exchange.. Then invest in some stocks. (Yes the game has its own living and breathing stock exchange that can be very hard and frustrating but can create a very large payout to those who figure it out.) After you gain a sum of money and are sitting happily in your battlecrusier struggling to maneuver the shipping lanes, look for the best place to get weapons, build some stations, and go exploring. Be cautious though, there is always someone who wants you dead. It is very dangerous and yes, you may be large and have enough cannons to block out the sun, but a well aimed missile can kill you and end your game. All in all 9/10.

												Three words can describe how my experience was in this game. Purely. Justifiably. Amazing. Surprising right, I know I know, It doesn't look like much from the pictures given, but a world that is amazing and full of unlimited possibilities awaits just beyond that door. It is best not to think of a single directive but more long term and while being a cutthroat pirate maybe fun and exciting it does not however pay very well, unless you hit a large target. This however is extremely difficult and takes a lot of preparation. So, whether or not you are planning your large heist you have to encounter trading at some point. This concept can take a little getting used to but my recommendation would be to go around trading energy cells until you have a good amount of cash, all the while looking at rising and falling stocks at the exchange.. Then invest in some stocks. (Yes the game has its own living and breathing stock exchange that can be very hard and frustrating but can create a very large payout to those who figure it out.) After you gain a sum of money and are sitting happily in your battlecrusier struggling to maneuver the shipping lanes, look for the best place to get weapons, build some stations, and go exploring. Be cautious though, there is always someone who wants you dead. It is very dangerous and yes, you may be large and have enough cannons to block out the sun, but a well aimed missile can kill you and end your game. All in all 9/10.
